person.persName: William J. Thurman (Mason County, Kentucky, cabinet maker, justice of the peace, and postmaster)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, cabinet maker, justice of the peace, and postmaster. Virginia native. Married to Ruth Hughey Thurman in Mason County, Kentucky, on February 23, 1842. Father of Mary Thurman, Betty Thurman, John Thurman, and James T. Thurman. Cabinet maker in Mason County in 1860. Justice of the peace of Mason County in 1861. Postmaster at Washington from July 9, 1861, to January 24, 1868. United States postmaster in Mason County in 1865.
